data.title: City hall, mayor, stats, schools, attractions, and more
data.meta_description: Located in Virginia, the City of Lynchburg has a lot to discover. Find more about its City Hall, Mayor, Schools, Banks, Passport Facilities, and Leisure Activities.
data.text:
The City of Lynchburg is located in the state of Virginia, in Lynchburg City. Its area, population and other key information are listed below.

For all your administrative procedures, you can go to the City hall of Lynchburg at the address and schedules indicated on this page or contact the Town hall government by phone or by email depending on your preference or on the service's availability.

Update data

Where is Lynchburg, Virginia ?

Lynchburg is an independent city located in the Commonwealth of Virginia, USA. It lies in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains, primarily situated within the Lynchburg Metropolitan Statistical Area. Lynchburg is approximately 50 miles east of Roanoke and 110 miles west of Richmond, providing a central position to significant urban centers in the state.
